title: i cant secure my account by verifying my mail!!!
body: It just doesnt work i get the mail i click on it but it says it expired!!! please help

replies.body: Verification emails often have an expiration, but you'll be able to send another one. Click on your profile on the top right of this page, go to **Settings** and you should be able to send another verification email. Let me know if that helps.
i cant find the option to send another email i enter the "click to edit your preferences" options but there is nothing about verification mail
Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help you out.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

As DTN mentioned, you should be able to get another email by submitting another verification request.  Be careful to not spam the verification as you may end up clicking on expired tokens while new ones are on the way.  Let me know if you still have any trouble, and we can dig deeper!
